main.description: A document record representing a published article, blog post, or other content. Documents can belong to a publication or exist independently.

site.description: Points to a publication record (at://) or a publication url (https://) for loose documents.

publishedAt.description: Timestamp of the document's publish time.

content.description: Open union used to define the record's content. Each entry must specify a $type.

description.description: A brief description or excerpt from the document.

textContent.description: Plaintext representation of the document's contents. Should not contain markdown or other formatting.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of the document's last edit.

tags.description: Array of strings used to tag or categorize the document.

path.description: Combine with site URL to construct a canonical URL to the document.

bskyPostRef.description: Strong reference to a Bluesky post.
